summary: an RTS, Tundra Defense, invasions or build mod meant to build without killing a skyrim npc
descriptionHtml:
This is a small tavern at the other side of the river of riverwood next to map 1 chest location with 3 hireling and a empty world with a fort
inside there are 3 followers.

fixes for 3.0
-Fixed follower textures and voices
-Fixed all the textures from tavern and world
-Created a small landscape by the river
-fixed forts positioning
-Fixed navmesh to be fully connected

This fort is meant for tundra defense ([url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22330/?[/url] )
or RTS skyrim ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12683/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12683/?[/url])
if you want an easy way to move copy and place items weapons barrels and npc use jaxonz positioner ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583/?[/url]).

this world is created with the creationkit and the fort is navmesh, only the exterior because the tundra defense makes interiors.

if you want to make more changes fell free to do so I know navmeshing a fort is dificult.

instalation: download manualy and drop into the main Â data folder then run launcher or loot if you have organizer
author: zerobakatu
